channel.title: Comments on: VB6 Remove date part of DateTime
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: riverguy
item.dc:creator: riverguy
item.description: Cool test. Although George if you continue writing VB6 blogs, I might be tempted to reinstall VB6 on my PC to try out some new ideas on some old code.
item.content:encoded: Cool test. Although George if you continue writing VB6 blogs, I might be tempted to reinstall VB6 on my PC to try out some new ideas on some old code.

item.title: By: traingamer
item.dc:creator: traingamer
item.description: It works essentially the same way in Access VBA. Since dates are stored as numbers, the numeric functions (Int) are much faster than the string (Format) functions.
item.content:encoded: It works essentially the same way in Access VBA. Since dates are stored as numbers, the numeric functions (Int) are much faster than the string (Format) functions.
